title: South America the series. -Volume 4
creator_credit: Phoenix Films, BFA Films and Video and Wayne Mitchell
brief_description: Part four of the five part series on South America travels towards the east of the Andes, exploring the countries of Argentina, Paraquay and Uruguay. The countries share a similar Spanish heritage, but as this video suggests, the similarities end there and each country is unique in its peoples and landscape.
